snippet: Tekele Cotton scored 9 straight points to fuel a 17-3 run in the first half, and No. 8 Wichita State beat Southern Illinois, 56-45, in the quarterfinals of the Missouri Valley Conference tournament in St. Louis.
abstract: Wichita State men's basketball team defeats Southern Illinois, 56-45, in Missouri Valley Conference tournament quarterfinals.
lead_paragraph: Tekele Cotton scored 9 straight points to fuel a 17-3 run in the first half, and No. 8 Wichita State beat Southern Illinois, 56-45, in the quarterfinals of the Missouri Valley Conference tournament in St. Louis.
